Article Title: Bihar: Nitish Kumar to take oath as CM for the record 10th time at Patna's Gandhi Maidan; PM Modi to attend the event
Article Text:
Nitish Kumar is set to take oath as CM for the tenth time (File photo)

Nitish Kumar To Take CM Oath For Record 10th Time At Patna's Gandhi Maidan, PM Modi To Attend

Hectic parley on ministerial berth

NEW DELHI: Patna is set to witness a major political show of strength on Thursday, with JD(U) chief Nitish Kumar scheduled to take oath as chief minister for a record 10th time at the historic Gandhi Maidan. He resigned on Wednesday as head of the outgoing NDA government.Governor Arif Mohammad Khan accepted his resignation on Wednesday and asked him to continue as caretaker CM until the new government is sworn in.Kumar was elected leader of the NDA legislature party earlier in the day during a meeting of newly elected MLAs of the alliance partners. The proposal was moved by JD(U) senior leader Vijay Choudhary and seconded by BJP leaders Samrat Choudhary and Vijay Sinha. MLAs of the LJP (RV), HAM and RLM also supported the proposal, JD(U) minister Shrawon Kumar said.Soon after his election as NDA leader, Kumar visited Raj Bhavan with senior alliance leaders, including Union minister Chirag Paswan, RLM chief Upendra Kushwaha and Uttar Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister Keshav Prasad Maurya, to submit his resignation and stake claim to form the new government. He is expected to hand over a formal letter of support from all NDA constituents to the governor before the oath ceremony.Several top leaders of the NDA are expected to attend the event at Gandhi Maidan, including Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Union home minister Amit Shah, defence minister Rajnath Singh, Union minister Dharmendra Pradhan and chief ministers of various states.Consensus has also been reached among NDA partners on key positions. BJP’s Prem Kumar is likely to be the next Speaker of the assembly, while the post of Deputy Speaker is expected to go to the JD(U).Sources told news agency PTI the new Cabinet will feature five to six new faces from the two main constituents of the alliance, the BJP and the JD(U), along with representation for the smaller partners.LJP (RV) is likely to get three berths in the new Cabinet, while HAM and RLM are expected to receive one berth each. Up to 16 ministers from the BJP and 14 from the JD(U), including Nitish Kumar, are likely to be sworn in.From the JD(U) side, senior leaders such as Bijendra Prasad Yadav, Vijay Kumar Choudhary, Shrowan Kumar, Sunil Kumar, Lesi Singh, Sheila Mandal, Madan Sahni, Ratnesh Sada, Mohammad Zama Khan, Jayant Raj, Umesh Singh Kushwaha and Ashok Chowdhary are seen as strong contenders. Others in consideration include Rahul Kumar Singh, Sudhanshu Shekhar, Kaladhar Prasad Mandal and Panna Lal Singh Patel.BJP sources indicated that most ministers from the outgoing Cabinet will continue in their roles. These include Samrat Choudhary, Prem Kumar, Mangal Pandey, Vijay Kumar Sinha, Nitish Mishra, Renu Devi, Jibesh Kumar, Neeraj Kumar Singh, Janak Ram, Hari Sahni, Kedar Prasad Gupta, Surendra Mehta, Santosh Kumar Singh, Sunil Kumar and Motil Lal Prasad. The party is also weighing three new additions, including former IPS officer Anand Mishra, Rana Randhir, Gayatri Devi and Vijay Kumar Khemka.Nitish Kumar’s swearing-in today marks yet another turning point in Bihar politics as the NDA prepares to return to power with a fresh Cabinet and renewed equations among its partners.
Article Summary: Jd(u) chief nitish kumar scheduled to take oath as chief minister for a record 10th time. He resigned on wednesday as head of the outgoing nda government. Up to 16 ministers from the bjp and 14 from the jd(u), including kumar, are likely to be sworn in.

Article Title: LiAngelo Ball, brother of NBA stars LaMelo and Lonzo Ball, makes Platinum history with breakout hit “Tweaker” featuring Drake
Article Text:
LiAngelo Ball (Image via AP Photo)

How “Tweaker” Became a Cultural Phenomenon

GELO - Tweaker (Official Video)

Tweaker 's Chart Domination and Viral Impact on Fans

How LiAngelo Ball Went From Basketball to Music Trailblazer

LiAngelo Ball’s transformation from overlooked basketball prospect to music industry headliner has officially reached a historic milestone. His debut single “Tweaker,” released under the stage name Gelo, has achieved platinum status - an achievement that puts him in the same conversation as heavyweight artists like Drake . For an athlete-turned-musician, this level of success is both unprecedented and culturally significant, signaling a genuine crossover moment that few have ever achieved.This accomplishment not only redefines LiAngelo’s public identity but also marks the peak of a rapid rise that began in early 2025. From a player often overshadowed by his brothers Lonzo and LaMelo Ball, LiAngelo has carved out an entirely new lane, proving that his artistic instincts and musical ambition were far more than a curiosity.Released in January 2025, “Tweaker” exploded online almost instantly. Its nostalgic, bouncy beat - powered by piano, organ keys, and lush synth pads - captured the spirit of early-2000s hip-hop. Paired with Gelo’s melodic, sing-song delivery and a catchy “whoa” hook reminiscent of Big Tymers-era anthems, the track resonated widely. Produced by Kunica and Glockie Cheez, the song painted a picture of luxury, swagger, and newfound fame, creating an irresistible vibe that appealed to both younger listeners and fans of classic hip-hop aesthetics.Its momentum grew even stronger as the song spread into sports culture.NBA and NFL teams, including the Detroit Lions, Chicago Bulls, and Cleveland Cavaliers, embraced “Tweaker” as a celebratory anthem in locker rooms and warm-up sessions, pushing its reach far beyond the usual music circles.The success of “Tweaker” eventually led to a massive $13 million record deal with Def Jam and Universal Music Group. The contract included an extraordinary $8 million guaranteed signing bonus—more than what many current NBA players earn annually. This landmark deal solidified Gelo’s credibility and marketability within the hip-hop and R&B world.Adding even more momentum, a high-profile remix featuring Lil Wayne elevated the track’s status, giving it a stamp of approval from one of rap’s most influential figures.“Tweaker” made history by reaching No. 1 on the US Rhythmic Billboard chart - an exceptional feat for a debut single from a former basketball player. The song sparked viral dance trends across social platforms and earned praise from artists like T-Pain, Lil Yachty, and Joe Budden. Its appeal spanned music, sports, and online culture, cementing LiAngelo Ball as 2025’s breakout music star.Before his rise in music, LiAngelo Ball spent years navigating international basketball leagues and the NBA G-League. Eventually, he stepped away from the sport entirely - a decision validated by his explosive success. His debut album League of My Own, released in July 2025, showcased his evolution as an artist and reaffirmed his place in the industry.LiAngelo Ball’s platinum achievement for “Tweaker” is more than a win for himself - it is a defining cultural moment. By stepping into music and dominating charts, he has written a rare success story that bridges athletics, entertainment, and mainstream culture.
Article Summary: Liangelo ball’s debut single “tweaker,” released under the stage name gelo, has achieved platinum status. For an athlete-turned-musician, this level of success is both unprecedented and culturally significant. It marks a genuine crossover moment that few have ever achieved.

Article Title: Is Joel Embiid playing tonight vs the Boston Celtics? Latest update on the Philadelphia 76ers star's injury report (November 20, 2025)
Article Text:
Philadelphia 76ers center Joel Embiid (21) drives for a shot against Toronto Raptors forward Scottie Barnes (4) (Image via Imagn)

Philadelphia 76ers

Joel Embiid

Joel Embiid Injury Report vs the Boston Celtics (November 20, 2025)

Increased Pressure on Drummond, Maxey, and the Supporting Cast







Sixers Prioritizing Long-Term Stability

Theenter tonight’s highly anticipated clash against the Boston Celtics under intense scrutiny as injuries continue to shape their early-season narrative. What was expected to be another marquee showdown between two Eastern Conference contenders has instead become a test of endurance, depth, and adaptability for both sides. With major stars ruled out, this matchup now offers a different kind of intrigue - one centered on how each team navigates adversity.For Philadelphia, the focus is once again on the absence of their franchise cornerstone,. As the team pushes through a difficult stretch of the schedule, the constant reshuffling of the rotation has placed added strain on the supporting cast. Still, the Sixers remain determined to compete at a high level, carrying the mindset that every player must be ready to step up.Joel Embiid will not take the floor tonight against the Celtics due to ongoing right knee soreness. The star center has been officially ruled out with a sprained right knee, marking his fifth consecutive missed game. While recent MRI scans revealed no structural damage, Embiid continues to deal with discomfort that limits his ability to play at full strength.With long-term health taking priority, the Sixers are opting for a cautious approach, ensuring he does not aggravate the injury further.His continued absence underscores the franchise’s commitment to preserving his availability for the later stages of the season. Despite anticipation surrounding his potential return, the organization remains firm: Embiid will rejoin the lineup only when he can compete without risk.Philadelphia looks to Andre Drummond and Tyrese Maxey to take on more responsibility in Joel Embiid's absence. Maxey must continue to be the attacking motor, while Drummond is expected to stabilize the frontcourt. The Sixers are also without Paul George and Kelly Oubre Jr., who are both sidelined by their own injuries, which further complicates the situation. As the coaching staff tries to maintain the team's competitiveness while keeping an eye on Embiid's recuperation, this stretch has pushed the roster's depth players into bigger responsibilities.Also read: Philadelphia 76ers vs Boston Celtics regular season game: Full injury report, who's out, and more (November 20, 2025) In summary, Joel Embiid will not play tonight against the Milwaukee Bucks due to persistent right knee soreness. As Philadelphia continues to prioritize his rehabilitation, the team leans heavily on its depth, hoping to remain competitive while safeguarding the long-term availability of its superstar.
Article Summary: Philadelphia 76ers center joel embiid will not take the floor tonight against the celtics due to ongoing right knee soreness. The star center has been officially ruled out with a sprained right knee, marking his fifth consecutive missed game.

Article Title: Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing tonight vs the Philadelphia 76ers? Latest update on the Milwaukee Bucks star's injury report (November 20, 2025)
Article Text:
Milwaukee Bucks' Giannis Antetokounmpo tries to get past Los Angeles Lakers' Deandre Ayton during the first half of an NBA basketball game Saturday, Nov. 15, 2025, in Milwaukee. (AP Photo/Morry Gash)

Milwaukee Bucks

confirmed absence of Giannis Antetokounmpo

Why is Giannis Antetokounmpo not playing tonight vs the Philadelphia 76ers? (November 20, 2025)

Milwaukee Bucks Injury Status vs the Philadelphia 76ers (November 20, 2025)

Philadelphia 76ers Injury Report vs the Milwaukee Bucks (November 20, 2025)

Theenter tonight’s matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers facing a major setback, as they will be without their franchise cornerstone. The anticipation surrounding this Eastern Conference meeting was already high, with both teams dealing with significant injuries, but thechanges the tone of the contest entirely. Fans expected a high-intensity duel between two playoff contenders, yet the spotlight now shifts to how each side adjusts without key contributors.This matchup was also meant to serve as an early-season measuring stick for both squads. The Bucks have been working to build chemistry under Doc Rivers while navigating depth challenges, and the 76ers are trying to stay competitive amid injury turbulence of their own. But with Giannis officially out, Milwaukee’s offensive and defensive systems will undergo their toughest test of the season so far.Giannis Antetokounmpo will not be available tonight as he recovers from a low-grade left groin strain suffered during a recent game against the Cleveland Cavaliers. The injury occurred in the second quarter, after which he did not return, prompting immediate concern across the organization. Following evaluations and consultations with the medical staff, head coach Doc Rivers confirmed that Giannis is expected to miss roughly one to two weeks.Losing the player who leads the team in both scoring and usage - averaging more than 31 points per game - creates a massive void for Milwaukee.Giannis’ impact extends beyond offensive production; his presence anchors the Bucks’ pace, rim pressure, transition attack, and interior defense. His absence naturally forces the team to rework rotations and identify new offensive initiators.With Giannis Antetokounmpo sidelined, Bobby Portis is expected to take on an expanded role. Historically, Portis has thrived when stepping in for the former MVP, boosting his scoring, minutes, and physical presence on the court. However, Milwaukee’s depth issues extend beyond Giannis: Taurean Prince remains out due to neck surgery, and Kevin Porter Jr. is unavailable following right knee surgery. These combined absences strain the team’s flexibility and reduce Rivers’ lineup options.Also read: Philadelphia 76ers vs Milwaukee Bucks regular season game: Full injury report, who's out, and more (November 20, 2025) The 76ers enter the game with their own health setbacks. Kelly Oubre Jr. is out for at least two weeks because of a knee sprain, while Joel Embiid is listed as doubtful as he continues managing knee discomfort. Even with these injuries, Philadelphia still retains a more stable core for tonight’s matchup compared to Milwaukee, given the magnitude of losing Giannis Antetokounmpo.
Article Summary: Giannis antetokounmpo will not be available tonight as he recovers from a low-grade left groin strain suffered during a recent game against the cleveland cavaliers. The injury occurred in the second quarter, after which he did not return, prompting immediate concern across the organization.

Article Title: Travis Kelce is in awe as Taylor Swift leaves him speechless with her “magical” presence
Article Text:
Travis Kelce is celebrating Taylor Swift's guest appearance on his podcast, 'New Heights,' which Apple ranked as one of the top episodes of 2025. The episode, recorded before their engagement, shattered viewership records, surpassing even Kylie Kelce's previous mark. Swift shared personal insights, and Travis credits her 'magical' star power for the immense success, highlighting their significant cultural influence.

Travis Kelce shares why Taylor Swift feels “so magical” in their latest chapter together

Franchise Records, Sanders NFL Debut, Taco Domination and We’re Going “Belly Bucking” | EP 165

Travis Kelce is soaking in a major win and this time, it has nothing to do with the scoreboard. The Kansas City Chiefs star is celebrating his fiancée Taylor Swift after her guest appearance on New Heights was named one of Apple’s top podcast episodes of 2025. During the Nov. 19 episode of the show, Travis and his brother Jason Kelce reacted to the news with the same excitement usually reserved for playoff victories.Taylor Swift’s episode, recorded just weeks before the couple announced their engagement, didn’t just attract listeners, it reshaped the history of the podcast and highlighted the couple’s growing cultural impact. And for Travis Kelce, there was no hesitation in crediting his fiancée’s star power.As Jason proudly shared that Apple ranked Swift’s episode at No. 3 for the year, Travis jumped in to praise her for being “so magical,” playfully acknowledging how her appearance drove massive engagement. The ranking puts Swift just behind two true-crime giants, a rare feat for a celebrity relationship episode in a crowded podcast landscape.Jason joked that other New Heights installments “aren’t even coming close” to Swift’s Aug.13 appearance, a sentiment fans echoed online. One user wrote, “there is no podcast episode better than the Taylor episode,” reflecting the enthusiasm that followed Swift’s debut on what she affectionately calls her “favorite” podcast.Swift’s sit-down quickly became the most-watched episode in the show’s history, surpassing the previous record held by Jason’s wife, Kylie Kelce. Kylie responded with trademark humor, admitting she’s “officially no longer the record holder” and adding, “I welcome that whole heartedly. Let’s drop that sucker down.”The episode offered fans a rare, candid look into Swift’s life. She opened up about reclaiming her masters, her father’s recent heart surgery, her Eras Tour journey, and the beginnings of her romance with Travis. In a twist fit for a rom-com, Travis proposed right after they wrapped recording.For Swift, the episode was another chance to connect with fans. For Travis, it became a milestone, proof of how their partnership continues to captivate audiences far beyond the NFL.Also Read: “Its complete ruthlessness”: Taylor Swift's insiders say Buffalo’s behavior proved NFL road games are ‘too toxic’ for her
Article Summary: Travis kelce is celebrating taylor swift's guest appearance on his podcast, 'new heights' the episode, recorded before their engagement, shattered viewership records, surpassing even kylie kelce's previous mark. Swift shared personal insights, and travis credits her'magical' star power for the success.

Article Title: Is Kaylee Hartung married or single? What we know about the TNF reporter’s personal and dating life
Article Text:
Kaylee Hartung dating life (Getty Images)

Kaylee Hartung’s love life revealed — is the Thursday Night Football sideline reporter secretly married?



Kaylee Hartung leads NFL coverage into 2025 season



The NFL’s Thursday Night Football is back on Amazon Prime Video for its fourth consecutive season, once again pairing Al Michaels and Kirk Herbstreit in the broadcast booth. Alongside them, Kaylee Hartung is returning as the trusted sideline reporter. While her sharp reporting earns praise each season, her personal life continues to spark curiosity, with fans frequently asking whether she is married or dating.Kaylee Hartung, 39, has established herself as a respected voice in sports journalism. A graduate of Washington and Lee University, she cut her teeth at CBS before moving on to ESPN and ABC. Today, she balances her role on Thursday Night Football with duties as a national correspondent for NBC’s Today Show, underscoring her versatility across media platforms.Despite her professional visibility, Hartung keeps her private life guarded. She is not married and has not publicly confirmed being in a relationship. However, she has been open about one deeply personal decision—freezing her eggs at age 35. In a candid conversation with Kylie Kelce, Hartung explained, “Something about that number and me sort of taking stock of where I'm at in my life struck me… I wanted to feel like I came out of the pandemic having accomplished something.Her decision resonated with many women navigating similar timelines. “It was a definite journey, but I'm so glad I did it. And I have been such a proponent of women who are even thinking about it, to do it,” she added. Her honesty has added a new dimension to her public persona, showing resilience and foresight beyond the sidelines.Hartung’s return comes as Thursday Night Football kicks off with the Green Bay Packers hosting the Washington Commanders in Wisconsin. The 2025 slate features marquee matchups like the San Francisco 49ers vs. Los Angeles Rams on October 2 and a Christmas Day clash between the Denver Broncos and Kansas City Chiefs.As the season unfolds, Hartung will once again deliver critical insights from the field. And while fans may keep speculating about her love life, it’s clear her focus remains firmly on delivering world-class reporting.Also Read: Tucker Kraft injury update: What happened to Packers TE against Commanders on Thursday Night Football?
Article Summary: Thursday night football is back on amazon prime video for its fourth consecutive season. Kaylee hartung, 39, has established herself as a respected voice in sports journalism. Despite her professional visibility, hartung keeps her private life guarded. She is not married and has not publicly confirmed being in a relationship.

Article Title: Kazuma Okamoto and Kona Takahashi enter MLB market as Japan posts two new stars
Article Text:
Kazuma Okamoto and Kona Takahashi (Image Source: Getty)

Japanese slugger Kazuma Okamoto ready to make impact

Pitcher Kona Takahashi brings rotation depth and Japanese craftsmanship

It is a historic moment for baseball in Japan. With that, two of the best developed talents in Japan, Kazuma Okamoto and Kona Takahashi, have been posted for the Major League Baseball market and are now able to negotiate with clubs in the U.S.The dual posting is certainly a step forward in international baseball relations, as it highlights the increased prominence of Japanese players around the world. Each being an elite talent with wide-ranging skills and plenty of success in Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB), their arrival could change the upcoming player segment of MLB free-agency. Both players now enter a critical 45-day window to secure MLB deals, after which they would return to their Japanese clubs if unsigned.At 29, Okamoto is seen as one of the premier power hitters in Japan. Since 2014, he's been mostly a corner infielder with the Yomiuri Giants, where he's hit 248 home runs in 1,074 games total, including six seasons in a row of 30 or more homers from 2018-23. Despite injuries constraining him to 69 games in '25, he turned in a superb. 327 batting average with a .598 OPS – showing his bat is still quite potent.Because he can play either end of the infield, Okamoto is not only one of the most powerful bats available in free agency but also one of the most flexible, something most MLB rosters will always be in the market for.His experience and production make him one of the most sought-after players on the international market this offseason.Takahashi, a right-handed starter from the Saitama Seibu Lions, brings a solid pitching resume with him into this posting. He's also sustained more than 1,500 innings of tough work through 2022-23 seasons with a 2.20 ERA and 1.13 WHIP in 330⅔ innings. His numbers did fall off a bit in 2024 and 2025, with ERAs in the low-3. Scouts think of him as a solid mid-rotation option with added potential, still, in the 00s range.His style emphasises command and precision rather than overpowering velocity, an approach that could translate well in MLB if managed carefully. Takahashi presents some good value for the clubs that are going to want solid starters without shelling out for top-shelf arms.Okamoto & Takahashi jointly highlight how Japanese baseball churns Major League-ready talent at the highest levels. Yes, their posting this year adds another layer of strategy and urgency to MLB's international market, and teams that act quickly to lock them down can obtain an unparalleled competitive advantage next season.Also Read: MLB trade rumors: Bo Bichette declines Blue Jays' qualifying offer for 2026 as Toronto braces for a pivot
Article Summary: Kazuma okamoto and kona takahashi have been posted for the major league baseball market. Both players now enter a critical 45-day window to secure mlb deals, after which they would return to their japanese clubs if unsigned. The dual posting is certainly a step forward in international baseball relations.

Article Title: Art Ross Trophy race gets exciting: Connor Bedard and Macklin Celebrini lead NHL scoring charge
Article Text:
Connor Bedard and Macklin Celebrini making waves in the Art Ross Trophy race (Image via: Getty Images)

Connor Bedard and Macklin Celebrini emerging as NHL leaders shaping the game



‘Make Bedard and Celebrini part of Team Canada’: Button on Olympic roster

The NHL’s Art Ross Trophy race is witnessing an exciting twist this season as young sensations Connor Bedard of the Chicago Blackhawks and Macklin Celebrini of the San Jose Sharks emerge as serious contenders. While established stars like Nathan MacKinnon and Connor McDavid continue to dominate, Bedard and Celebrini are demonstrating that the next generation of NHL superstars is ready to make an immediate impact on the league.Bedard, 20, has already accumulated 29 points in 19 games, registering 13 goals and 16 assists, an impressive 1.53 points per game. Celebrini, 19, matches Connor McDavid with 30 points through 13 goals and 17 assists, maintaining a 1.50 points-per-game pace. Both have scored two hat tricks and secured two game-winning goals each, including Celebrini’s overtime heroics against the Utah Mammoth. Their electrifying performances highlight not just individual talent but the resurgence of hockey excitement in Chicago and San Jose, cities that have been longing for standout players to lead their teams.Their shooting percentages, 22.8% for Celebrini and 20% for Bedard, are much higher than their career averages, but these strong numbers show an impressive start to the 2025–26 season and the clear progress both players are making.Even with potential regression, they are on track for long-term success and lasting impact. Beyond the stats, their consistent performances establish them as emerging leaders and key figures in the next generation of NHL talent.Chicago, navigating the post-Toews and Kane era, now has Bedard to energize its roster and elevate its competitiveness. Similarly, San Jose has found in Celebrini the centerpiece needed to steer the Sharks out of rebuild mode and back into contention. Looking ahead, both stars are likely to feature prominently on Team Canada rosters for the 2026 Olympics and future World Cup of Hockey tournaments, cementing their legacy as NHL game-changers.Connor Bedard and Macklin Celebrini are doing more than chasing the Art Ross Trophy—they are reshaping the NHL landscape. Their early-season dominance, scoring ability, and leadership on the ice are giving fans a glimpse of the league’s future, making the 2025–26 season one of the most exciting in recent years.Also Read: Sharks’ Macklin Celebrini breaks NHL records: Teen star ranks alongside Wayne Gretzky, Sidney Crosby and Mario Lemieux
Article Summary: Connor bedard and macklin celebrini emerging as nhl leaders shaping the game. Bedard, 20, has already accumulated 29 points in 19 games, registering 13 goals and 16 assists, an impressive 1.53 points per game. Celebrini, 19, matches connor mcdavid with 30 points, maintaining a 1.50 points-per-game pace.

Now signed with the Patriots, his journey highlights the crucial role of mental resilience and personal encouragement in professional sports.

Article Title: Saudi boxing chief makes tense Jake Paul statement moments after Anthony Joshua fight update
Article Text:
Saudi boxing chief makes tense Jake Paul statement moments after Anthony Joshua fight update (Image via Getty)

Turki Alalshikh says Anthony Joshua knockout would be “good for boxing”



Jake Paul is now set to fight Anthony Joshua, and this news has shocked the whole boxing world. The fight is set for December 19 in Miami, and it will be a real heavyweight fight. This is Jake Paul’s hardest test ever because Anthony Joshua is a former two-time unified world heavyweight champion. Joshua is also much bigger and stronger. He has knocked out very famous fighters like Wladimir Klitschko and Alexander Povetkin.The most surprising part is that Saudi boxing chief Turki Alalshikh says he wants Anthony Joshua to knock out Jake Paul. He said this during an interview on “Tha Boxing Voice”. His comments made many people talk because some fans fear that Jake Paul may get hurt. Earlier this year, Jake Paul called out Anthony Joshua on his own show, “BS with Jake Paul.” Many people did not believe this fight would ever happen, but now it is fully confirmed.Turki Alalshikh said he wants Anthony Joshua to “destroy” Jake Paul in the fight. He said that if Joshua knocks out Paul, it will help him because the “headache” of dealing with Jake Paul will be gone. He also said that if Jake Paul somehow wins, then it means Joshua is “finished” and Jake Paul should get a real boxing ranking.Turki Alalshikh said he feels sure Anthony Joshua can knock Jake Paul out.He even said he wants the fight to feel “99-1,” meaning he wants Joshua to be the clear winner. He also said he is not sure that Edgar Berlanga could knock Jake Paul out, but he believes Joshua can do it.Many boxing experts also think Anthony Joshua will win very fast. They think he may stop Jake Paul in the first round because of his size and power. But rising heavyweight fighter Lawrence Okolie said he thinks the fight may last longer.He told reporters that Anthony Joshua may not try to end the fight in the first 30 seconds. He said if Jake Paul starts landing punches, then things may change and the fight may become more interesting.Right now, all eyes are on December 19. This fight has become one of the most talked-about boxing events of the year. Fans are waiting to see if Anthony Joshua will crush Jake Paul or if Jake Paul will shock the world again.Also Read: Jake Paul’s Mom Is Terrified After Anthony Joshua Fight News As Logan Paul And Tyson Fury Respond
Article Summary: Saudi boxing chief makes tense jake paul statement moments after anthony joshua fight update. Turki alalshikh says anthony joshua knockout would be “good for boxing” jake paul is now set to fight anthony joshua, and this news has shocked the whole boxing world. The fight is set for december 19 in miami.

Article Title: AJ Lee fires back after fan posts fake kissing clip and WWE fans question safety at events
Article Text:
AJ Lee fires back after fan posts fake kissing clip and WWE fans question safety at events (Image via Getty)



AJ Lee and fan Chris Horror clash after altered “kissing” video goes viral

AJ Lee had a very serious moment this week after a fan posted a fake video of her. AJ Lee, the former WWE star, met fans at The Big Event Entertainment & Sports Expo last weekend. One fan, who goes by @Chris_HorrorYT on X, took a normal meet-and-greet video with her. But later, he changed the clip and posted an altered video that made it look like AJ Lee and he were kissing. The fake video upset many people online because it was not real, and it was made without AJ Lee’s permission. When AJ Lee saw the post, she replied on X and wrote, “This is inappropriate and it is harassment. Please delete.”Even after AJ Lee asked him to take the video down, the fan did not remove it. This made fans even more angry, and the story spread across many wrestling news sites.Reports from NoDQ, SEScoops, and Fightful say the problem started after the fan edited the clip to make it look like he kissed AJ Lee at the event. The video was not true and was changed using simple editing tools. AJ Lee spoke up right away because the clip could harm her image and was very disrespectful. Her message made it clear that she did not agree to this and wanted it removed.But instead of deleting the video, @Chris_HorrorYT answered another user who called the clip “flattering.”He replied, “Thank you!!!!” and even added a GIF of Vince McMahon. This reply made the situation worse because it looked like he was proud of the fake clip.Many fans online said the video crossed a line because it changed a normal meeting into something false. WWE fans also pointed out that wrestlers already deal with many tough fan situations, and this adds more stress. The video also stayed up all week, even after AJ Lee clearly told him to delete it.Wrestling fans on X/Twitter kept asking the fan to take the clip down and respect AJ Lee’s wishes. This story spread fast online because AJ Lee is a very popular name in wrestling.Her strong and clear response showed that she did not accept this kind of behavior. Fans are now asking for better rules at fan events and on social media to protect wrestlers from altered videos like this in the future.Also Read: WWE RAW Madison Square Garden Became Historic With Three Bombshell Returns
Article Summary: Aj lee met fans at the big event entertainment & sports expo last weekend. One fan took a normal meet-and-greet video with her but later, he changed the clip and posted an altered video that made it look like aj lee and he were kissing. When aj lee saw the post, she replied on x and wrote, “this is inappropriate and it is harassment.

Article Title: ‘10 hours with no WiFi’ has Tua Tagovailoa’s wife Annah Gore and Quinton Bell’s fiancée Brooke going viral after Miami Dolphins win
Article Text:
Annah Gore and Brooke Lewis go viral after a ten hour no WiFi flight home from Madrid following the Miami Dolphins win. (Images via Instagram)

Annah Gore and Brooke Lewis take the spotlight with a brutally honest travel update after the Miami Dolphins’ Madrid win

The rising WAGs duo and why Annah Gore and Brooke Lewis feel like the Miami Dolphins’ unofficial second storyline

Tua Tagovailoa’s season sits under a microscope while Annah Gore stays consistent in the middle of the noise

Will John Tavares play tonight against the Columbus Blue Jackets? Latest update on the Toronto Maple Leafs star (Credit: Getty Images)

The Unreal Career Of John Tavares

John Tavares's playing status for Toronto Maple Leafs vs Columbus Blue Jackets game



The Toronto Maple Leafs return home tonight for a marquee match. That too, against the Columbus Blue Jackets, and all eyes are on captain John Tavares. Having played a central role in Toronto’s offense so far this season. His presence could be decisive in what is expected to be a tightly contested game.Columbus arrives with momentum of its own, leaning heavily on standout performances from Zachary Werenski and rising forwards who have boosted the team’s scoring. With both teams battling for positioning, Tavares’ status has become one of the biggest storylines ahead of puck drop.John Tavares is expected to suit up tonight against the Columbus Blue Jackets, barring any last-minute changes. The Maple Leafs captain has been a reliable force, producing consistently in Toronto’s top six. While leading by example in high-pressure matches. His ability to control faceoffs, distribute the puck. At the same time, provide net-front presence remains essential. Especially against a physical Blue Jackets defense.Tavares has been participating fully in team activities. This is suggesting that he is healthy and ready for action.With Toronto aiming to tighten defensive gaps. While maintaining its high-scoring identity. Article Title: Katie Johnson shares the warm and honest story behind her first meeting with Jack Flaherty
Article Text:
Katie Johnson shares the warm and honest story behind her first meeting with Jack Flaherty (Image Via Getty)

Katie Johnson shares how she met Jack Flaherty

Jack Flaherty, the starting pitcher for the Detroit Tigers, is in a happy relationship with former soccer forward Katie Johnson. Fans have seen them share photos over the past few months, but until now, they did not know how the couple first met. On Wednesday, Katie Johnson finally shared the real beginning of their love story during a Q&A session with her followers on Instagram.One fan asked her, “How did you and Jack meet?” Katie Johnson answered with a simple line: “My teammate set us up.” She did not name the teammate, but the answer gave fans the first clear look into how their relationship began.Katie Johnson is a former forward who played in the National Women’s Soccer League and also represented Mexico in international games because her mother is Mexican.She retired in December 2024 after a long career with teams such as Seattle Reign, Sky Blue FC, Chicago Red Stars, San Diego Wave, and Angel City FC. After stepping away from soccer, she became a Pilates instructor in California.The relationship between Jack Flaherty and Katie Johnson became public in July 2025, when they posted photos from a date at The French Laundry, a three-Michelin-star restaurant in Napa Valley, California.In August, Jack Flaherty shared black-and-white pictures of the couple, writing, “Doesn’t get better than this.” After the 2025 postseason, where the Detroit Tigers’ playoff run ended in the ALDS against the Seattle Mariners, the couple traveled to Mexico City for a short getaway.Katie Johnson posted photos in a floral bikini from the trip. A few weeks later, she also visited Spain, sharing a picture from a yacht in Port de Sóller, wearing an orange bikini. Jack Flaherty commented on the post, “I want to be like you.”Jack Flaherty is coming off a challenging season. In 2025, he posted a 4.64 ERA, a 1.28 WHIP, and an 8-15 record in 31 starts. This came just one year after his World Series win with the Los Angeles Dodgers in 2024.Even with the tough year on the mound, his relationship with Katie Johnson has remained steady and very public, giving fans a softer look at the right-hander’s life outside baseball.Also Read: Former New York Yankees Player Mark Teixeira Raises Alarm As ICE Faces Huge Threat Spike From AI Lies
Article Summary: Jack flaherty, the starting pitcher for the detroit tigers, is in a happy relationship with former soccer forward katie johnson. Fans have seen them share photos over the past few months, but until now, they did not know how the couple first met. Katie johnson shared the real beginning of their love story during a q&a session with her followers on instagram.

Article Title: Aaron Rodgers injury update: Steelers QB eyes return against Chicago Bears amid broken wrist setback; Adam Schefter reveals details
Article Text:
Aaron Rodgers eyes return against Bears despite wrist injury (Image via: Getty Images)

Aaron Rodgers eyes return against Bears after Wrist injury, Adam Schefter confirms

Steelers’ Aaron Rodgers won’t need surgery on fractured wrist | Pro Football Talk | NFL on NBC

Aaron Rodgers’ past battles with Bears adds extra motivation for Steelers match



Aaron Rodgers’ return for Sunday’s showdown against the Chicago Bears remains uncertain after he suffered a broken wrist in last week’s 32-14 win over the Cincinnati Bengals. The 41-year-old four-time NFL MVP is determined but cautious, aware that rushing back too soon could aggravate the injury. Adam Schefter reveals Rodgers is pushing to practice and hopes to take the field, a potential boost for the Steelers as they aim to maintain their position in the division standings.Despite the injury, Rodgers’ drive to play is high. Now leading the Steelers’ offense, he brings veteran leadership and experience to Pittsburgh. Sunday’s matchup against Chicago carries extra significance, offering Rodgers a chance to write another memorable chapter in his legendary career while facing one of the NFL’s most historic rivalries.Rodgers injured his non-throwing wrist late in the first half against Cincinnati when he rolled to his left and landed awkwardly. While it’s not his throwing wrist, he must be able to protect himself and handle the ball safely to be cleared. Rodgers could return to practice as early as Thursday, with Steelers coach Mike Tomlin highlighting Friday as a crucial day for deciding the starting QB. “As for Aaron Rodgers, a big test today,” ESPN’s Adam Schefter said.“He plans to try to practice despite the fact that he has a fracture in his left wrist. We’ll see how that practice goes. Clearly didn’t practice yesterday. Wants to play on Sunday in Chicago. Has been pushing to play.”If Rodgers cannot play, Mason Rudolph is prepared to step in. Rudolph has excelled in previous appearances, posting a QB rating near 120 and helping Pittsburgh stay competitive. He’s ready for any scenario, drawing on past experiences to handle a sudden start. The quarterback room remains upbeat, with Rodgers offering support and guidance, helping maintain focus and cohesion ahead of Sunday’s matchup.Rodgers’ motivation to return goes beyond the Steelers’ playoff push. The 41-year-old four-time MVP has a long history with Chicago, having clashed memorably with the Bears throughout his Green Bay career. “There’s incentive for every opponent, but I have enjoyed many Sundays, Mondays, and Thursdays in that city,” Rodgers said. “It’s a great sports town, phenomenal fans, and a great place to play.” This experience adds another layer of significance to Sunday’s game, even as he navigates recovery from a broken wrist.Rodgers’ return would strengthen the Steelers’ playoff aspirations while testing his recovery from a broken wrist. Pittsburgh’s offense hinges on his leadership, and his performance against the Bears could define the team’s push in the NFL’s competitive division, adding another milestone to Rodgers’ storied career.Also Read: Isaiah Rodgers subtly mocks with $17K penalty comment on Isaac Rochell’s reel after Allison Kuch reacts to Ja’Marr Chase’s $507K fine
Article Summary: Aaron rodgers could return to practice as early as thursday. Rodgers injured his non-throwing wrist against cincinnati bengals last week. Rodgers has a long history with chicago, having clashed memorably with the bears throughout his green bay career. If rodgers cannot play, mason rudolph is prepared to step in.

Article Title: Jason Kelce shares emotional throwback as he discusses issues around Philadelphia Eagles and Jalen Hurts
Article Text:
Jason Kelce shares some solutions for Eagles' issues. Source: X

Jason Kelce shares solution for Jalen Hurts, Eagles reported issues

The Eagles are in the running for the No. 1 seed after beating the Detroit Lions. At 8–2, the Eagles are tied for the NFC’s best record as they try to defend their Super Bowl crown. But despite their strong start, the team has faced constant reports of internal issues. Star receiver A.J. Brown is reportedly frustrated with his reduced role in an offense that has been under constant scrutiny. Needless to say, some of that frustration has been directed at quarterback Jalen Hurts, whose numbers are good overall but who has struggled at times to consistently feed the team’s top weapons.Jason Kelce, who spent his entire 13-year career with the Philadelphia Eagles, recently opened up about his unhappiness over what he’s hearing about the Eagles this season.After their trip to the Super Bowl in 2022, the Eagles’ 2023 season was full of escalating tensions and even talk that coach Nick Sirianni could be fired. That team exited in the wild-card round, only to rebound and win the Super Bowl the following year.That chaotic 2023 season was also the final one for longtime centre Jason Kelce. Now, it goes without saying that the 2025 squad is showing some similar warning signs. Kelce went on local station SportsRadio 94WIP to talk about what the Eagles can do to fix things inside the locker room.“I think the quotes on Jalen—I think there are frustrations on a team that build up continually. I think Jalen gets a lot of the highlighting of that because he’s the quarterback,” Kelce said. “... This is part of being part on a team, there are so many ups and downs.”Kelce then got emotional while recalling a story about how he and Eagles right tackle Lane Johnson didn't speak for an entire offseason because of a fight they had."Me and Lane Johnson, one year, at the end of Chip Kelly's career, Lane made a comment in the media and said something along the lines of, 'The up-tempo offense is way too hard on us in practice and we're working too difficult and guys are getting fatigued.' And I remember reading that... and I went out and said something in the media and said, 'What does Lane know? Lane's only been with the Philadelphia Eagles. How does he know what it feels like to do other practices? He's only practiced with Chip Kelly. ..'"Lane then made another comment. Lane and I didn't talk for an entire offseason. Lane is like one of my best friends. Like, I love that guy. And this is part of being on a team. There are so many ups and downs... this thing brings out emotions and sides of people because you all want to win so bad..."Kelce used this reference to address what the Eagles can do to move forward. He added that the only way the Eagles can solve the issues is by being accountable and talking about it.He said, “I think by and large, the body of work Jalen has put out there, you can’t deny, in my opinion. I think you need to continue to work through this and be accountable and maintain these relationships in a healthy way.”Also Read: More coverage from the NFL
Article Summary: Jason kelce shares some solutions for eagles' issues. Kelce: "there are frustrations on a team that build up continually" the eagles are in the running for the no. 1 seed after beating the detroit lions. At 8–2, the eagles are tied for the nfc’s best record.

Article Title: NHL injury update: Charlie McAvoy ruled out as Boston Bruins face setback
Article Text:
NHL injury update: Charlie McAvoy ruled out as Boston Bruins face setback (Credit: Getty Images)

Charlie McAvoy Injury takes a slap shot to the face | Boston Bruins vs Canadiens 2025 Highlights

Charlie McAvoy’s injury situation sidelines Boston Bruins' defense





The Boston Bruins enter a challenging phase of their season with star defenseman Charlie McAvoy officially sidelined for an indefinite period. His injury comes at a time when the team was building momentum in the Eastern Conference. Also, making the setback particularly difficult for head coach Marco Sturm’s group. McAvoy’s strong start to the season had been instrumental in Boston’s early success.The 27-year-old was injured during Boston’s 3-2 win over the Montreal Canadiens when he was struck in the face by a powerful slap shot from Noah Dobson. McAvoy was taken to a hospital immediately and later underwent facial surgery. The Bruins quickly confirmed that he would not return anytime soon, creating a major gap on their blue line.Head coach Marco Sturm shared that McAvoy is currently recovering at home but remains without a clear timeline for return. “He’s doing good, but we still don’t know how long he’s going to be out,” Sturm told reporters. With McAvoy out indefinitely, the Bruins must rely heavily on other defensemen to maintain stability in their defensive structure.McAvoy had recorded 14 assists in 19 games and led the Boston Bruins in ice time.And, averaging over 23 minutes per game. His ability to drive play and anchor the defense makes his absence one of the most significant losses Boston could face. Without him, players like Hampus Lindholm and Nikita Zadorov. Also, now shoulder increased responsibilities on the back end.Compounding McAvoy’s injury is Boston’s growing list of sidelined players. This including Elias Lindholm, Viktor Arvidsson, Casey Mittelstadt, and Jordan Harris.As the Bruins push forward in a competitive Atlantic Division, McAvoy’s absence will test their resilience, and the team now looks to stay afloat. While awaiting further updates on their top defenseman’s recovery.Also Read: Will William Nylander play against the St. Louis Blues tonight? Latest update on Toronto Maple Leafs star
Article Summary: Boston bruins star defenseman charlie mcavoy ruled out indefinitely with a slap shot to the face. The 27-year-old was injured during boston’s 3-2 win over the montreal canadiens when he was struck in the face by a powerful slap shot from noah dobson. The bruins quickly confirmed that he would not return anytime soon, creating a major gap on their blue line.

Article Title: Adam Lowry contract update: Jets secure forward with five-year, $25M extension in crucial step for long-term strategy
Article Text:
Adam Lowry signs five-year, $25M deal with Jets (Image via: Getty Images)

Adam Lowry signs five-year, $25M contract as Jets secure captain for future



Adam Lowry’s future with the Winnipeg Jets is officially locked in, and the timing couldn’t be more strategic. The Jets captain signed a five-year, $25 million contract extension on Wednesday, eliminating any uncertainty around his future just months before he was set to hit unrestricted free agency. The move showcases Winnipeg’s trust in Lowry’s leadership, work ethic, and ability to anchor the team at critical moments, especially with the franchise chasing long-term consistency.Despite missing the first 12 games of the season due to hip surgery on May 27, the 32-year-old forward has quickly made his presence felt since returning to action on November 4, recording three points (one goal, two assists) in seven games. His resilience, coupled with a standout 2023–24 campaign where he posted a career-high 16 goals along with 18 assists in 73 appearances, makes the timing of the deal even more significant. At $5 million average annual value, the Jets have successfully retained an experienced two-way center without heavily impacting their salary cap structure.Lowry’s extension serves as more than just a financial agreement—it represents a tactical step toward preserving locker room stability and competitive intensity.As captain, he brings grit, physicality, and defensive accountability, traits that often prove essential in tightly contested playoff matchups. Since being selected by Winnipeg in the third round (No. 67) of the 2011 NHL Draft, Lowry has accumulated 276 points (122 goals, 154 assists) in 782 regular-season games and 24 points across 62 postseason appearances.For Lowry, the extension offers long-term security and solidifies his status as a foundational piece within the organization. For the Jets, it ensures continuity at center and reinforces a leadership core capable of guiding younger talent. With the franchise aiming to remain a competitive playoff contender, securing their captain signals a long-term vision built around on-ice resilience and locker room influence.As Winnipeg prepares for the stretch ahead, this move underlines their commitment to internal development rather than short-term fixes. With Lowry set to lead the charge over the next five seasons, the Jets have taken a clear step toward building sustainable success through seasoned leadership and on-ice consistency.Also Read: Sharks’ Macklin Celebrini breaks NHL records: Teen star ranks alongside Wayne Gretzky, Sidney Crosby and Mario Lemieux
Article Summary: Winnipeg jets captain adam lowry signs five-year, $25m contract extension. The 32-year-old was set to hit unrestricted free agency at the end of the season. The move showcases winnipeg's trust in lowry's leadership, work ethic, and ability to anchor the team at critical moments.
